title: what is after 14 day ban ?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: {{champion:92}} ive spent so much money on this game (200+ e) and im afraid of permaban.... what will happen after the 2 week ban?{{champion:92}}

replies.body: But what if i dont say anything but i get report for no reason ?
False reports will not cause a punishment to occur since they are tossed out.

Thats a lie. Reporting someone by spamming any report makes the computer system look for "valid" reasons it may deem fit even if it wasnt in the description. This has been confirmed by multiple riot employees. False reporting someone for verbal if you didnt say a word can result in a ban for other reasons not covered.

That's not true. Reporting for verbal reasons, looks at chat logs. Reporting someone for feeding looks at a number of things that would indicate feeding. You may be talking about a manual ban. Player support does manually review certain cases.
just because you think they are feeding doesnt mean they are intentionally feeding. but you guys dont really care do you?
Actually, our intentional feeding detection has VERY low false positive rates. Less than 1 in every 10,000. We don't just look at a KDA. Yes, we do care.
logged in just to downvote you
Prove it. Show us a rioter saying so.
Proof

Permaban but....


Your punishments reset with the new season, so you just have to wait it out.


Just play on another account like I do.
It doesn't reset with the new season. You have to play consistently non-toxic to go down tiers.
I stopped playing after a suspension and my next step was a 10 game chat ban.

How long ago? The punishment system was reworked.

> [BUT WHAT IF I REFORM? IS IT POSSIBLE TO GO DOWN THE ESCALATION PATH?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-)
Yes! Players who show _consistent_ reform or show positive behavior in their games will help heal their accounts reputation.

You can't show improvement if you don't play. Tantram has confirmed this repeatedly.
Edit: Here's some proof:[RIOT POST](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Wjgpp3xY-never-ending-you-are-ineligible-to-earn-loot-due-to-previous-behavioral-restrictions?comment=0007)

permaban if you dont stfu.
true
i believe that 3 months without any corrective action and it'll pop back down to a 14 day ban.
That's an average. You have to play consistently without being toxic to prove reform to move down tiers.

Never speak again while playing that account.

Permaban. Fix your behavior. The money you spent doesn't matter.
Type crap one more time, BAM, you got permabanned. The end.

After a two week ban is a permaban.

If you haven't tried to change before now, I hold little hope for you. Anything that would get you a chat restriction will permaban you at this point.

You've got to be on your *absolute best* behavior for the next three months or so to avoid getting a permaban. Good luck, remember to mute and not type when angry.
